attributes.review: This is the worst app ever when I first got it it was fine but then I seen Donald trumps d and I don’t wanna see that my 5 year old cousin was next to me at that time she said what that was and I said nothing and she said it was small this needs to get off the App Store

attributes.review: This app is soo bad 🤮🤮🤢🤢it took so long to load and it made me take so many steps to sign in.  CONSTANTLY giving me biased and fakes info and news and all ONLY from one side the RIGHT. TERRIBLE. Told me who to vote for and I don’t want THIS terrible app telling me this.  I’m not voting for this man just BECAUSE Of this app. Don’t download.
attributes.title: Terrible app

attributes.review: I recently bought this app to stay in tune with the 2020 election and it kept sending MAGA texts to my friends. They were mad that i was texting them these and blocked me. I don’t recommend it! It’s also very glitchy
attributes.title: Glitchy and sent texts without my knowledge!

attributes.review: When I saw that our president came out with an app, I was super excited! But then I remembered that he’s a racist, homophobic, transphobic, sexist, disrespectful, unintelligent, narcissistic piece of trash who has done nothing but make people suffer and is a danger to our country. 1 out of 5 stars, do not recommend.
attributes.title: get the hot Cheeto out of office 🧚🏻💖✨

attributes.review: Definitely would not!!!!!! Recommend! There’s a weird bug that freezes your phone and shows trumps face!!! I had to wait for my battery to die and then reset my phone! Agh I would give lower rating if possible 😡😡😡

attributes.review: I downloaded it and it when i opened it it immediately started glitching and bugged my whole phone. I’ve been trying to fix it for two hours and it’s still not working right! get this app off of the store!!
attributes.title: awful

attributes.review: So as one good child of god does i download this app only to see on the first page FEET PICTURES!! Decided i had quite the roller coster with this app i decided to email the manager and leave a yelp review.
attributes.title: Mortified, and calling the manager the saga.
